text: na unake maans allaah ko pahunchate hai aur na unake rakt. kintu use tumhaara taqava (dharmaparaayanata) pahunchata hai. is prakaar usane unhen tumhaare lie vasheebhoot kiya hai, taaki tum allaah kee badaee bayaan karo, isapar ki usane tumhaara maargadarshan kiya aur sukarmiyon ko shubh soochana de do
